de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.persistence.db.handler
Class AbstractDatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.persistence.db.handler.AbstractDatabaseHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContinentHandler, CountryHandler, NeighbourHandler, PlayerHandler, WorldHandler
public abstract class AbstractDatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract database handler, which every database handler should inherit from. Provides database connection handling, sending sql statements and so on.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: AbstractDatabaseHandler.java 663 2010-07-04 16:24:05Z andre.koenig $
